entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 a.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.6Â°C

Observed at: Geraldton Airport 11:09 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

Visibility: 5 km

entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets or freezing rain beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets or snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
